#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int k,t;
int ans[10][5];
for(int i = 0; i <= 9; i++){
ans[i][0] = i;
for(int j = 1; j <= 3; j++){
ans[i][j] = ans[i][j-1] * i;
ans[i][j] %= 10;
}
}
   long long int p;
   char s[25];
   scanf("%d",&t);
   while(t--)
   {
     scanf("%s %lld",&s,&p);
     k=s[strlen(s)-1]-'0';
     if(p==0){printf("1\n");continue;}
     p--;
     printf("%d\n",ans[k][p%4]);
   }
   return 0;
}
